tips.title: Password Security Tips
tips.tip1: Use a unique password you don't use elsewhere
tips.tip2: Include a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols
tips.tip3: Avoid personal information like names or birthdays

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account

setup.title: Set Up Two-Factor Authentication
setup.description: Secure your account with an additional authentication step

step1.title: Install Authenticator App
step1.description: Download and install an authenticator app on your mobile device

step2.title: Scan QR Code
step2.description: Use your authenticator app to scan this QR code
step2.qrInstructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app

step3.title: Verify Setup
step3.description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app

manageSection.title: Two-Factor Authentication
manageSection.noBackupCodes: No backup codes have been generated yet. Click below to generate new backup codes.
manageSection.verifyToGenerate: Enter your 2FA code to generate backup codes
manageSection.enterCodeFromApp: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
manageSection.regenerateWarning: ⚠️ Regenerating will invalidate all current backup codes. Make sure to save the new ones.
manageSection.generateInfo: These backup codes can be used to access your account if you lose your authenticator device.
manageSection.codesAccessedMessage: Your backup codes have been securely saved and are no longer visible for security reasons.
manageSection.codesExistSecurely: You have backup codes securely stored (not shown for security)
manageSection.regenerateToView: Regenerate backup codes to view and download new ones.
manageSection.backupCodesImportant: ⚠️ IMPORTANT: Save these backup codes immediately! They will be hidden after confirmation for security.
manageSection.confirmSaved: I have saved my backup codes securely (downloaded or written down)
manageSection.mustSaveFirst: Please download or copy your backup codes before confirming.

disable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.warning: This will remove 2FA protection from your account

success.backupCodesCleared: Backup codes cleared from browser memory for security
success.backupCodesSecured: Backup codes have been securely saved and removed from browser

countdown.expiresIn: Setup expires in {{seconds}} seconds. Complete verification promptly.
countdown.expired: Setup expired. Generating new QR code...
countdown.newCodeGenerated: New QR code generated. Please scan the updated code.

twoFactor.codeHelp: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
twoFactor.backupCodeHelp: Enter one of your 8-character backup codes

passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.description: Sign in securely with biometrics or device authentication
passkeys.deviceNameHint: Give this device a recognizable name
passkeys.noPasskeysDescription: Add a passkey to sign in securely with biometrics
passkeys.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to remove the passkey for {{deviceName}}?

unsupported.title: Passkeys Not Supported
unsupported.description: Your browser doesn't support passkeys. Please use a modern browser.

errors.notSupported: Passkeys are not supported on this device

info.title: About Passkeys
info.point1: Passkeys are more secure than passwords
info.point2: Use biometrics or device PIN to sign in

auditLog.title: Security Audit Log
auditLog.description: View your account's security activity and login history
auditLog.searchPlaceholder: Search by device, location, or action...
auditLog.noEntriesDescription: Your security activity will appear here
auditLog.noMatchingEntries: No entries match your search criteria

recommendations.title: Security Recommendations
recommendations.enable2fa: Enable two-factor authentication for better security
recommendations.addPasskey: Add a passkey for passwordless authentication
recommendations.strongPassword: Use a stronger password with mixed characters

validation.backupCodeInvalid: Please enter a valid 8-character backup code
